about_the_game:
How come when everything seems to be ok something has to happen that brings me back to square one?

The Event

Although the Metavertex was solved, so much fuss ended up overlapping the realities. Now people are aware that there is something else and that Lex is the point around which the events orbit.

The Loop

Meanwhile Lex just wants to live peacefully. He has found his place and love. The future looked bright, until the Narrative did its thing.

All for being who he is when he couldn't choose it.

Lex will take the journey he didn't want to take to discover things he didn't want to discover to have to make the decision he never wanted to make.

In his last adventure.

Features:

  • Lex strikes again, alongside Gina as a playable character!

  • Closing the saga – new characters with old themes come together in the last adventure of the charismatic character.Aventura gráfica de la vieja escuela

  • Even more simple mechanics (farewell right click), several challengin puzzles and pixel hunting (once again you have been warned).

  • Minigames: as part of the plot they will delight the most demanding players.

  • Developed by one person!

  • More pixel art, more laughs, more pop-culture references, more of everything you previously enjoyed.
